title: She's Afraid To Divorce Her Husband Because Of This...
description:
She's planning on divorcing her husband, but there's something she's worried about before she takes action. She currently works for her husband. Because of this, she knows if she serves him divorce papers, he might fire her.
This will leave her in a tough place. So legally, what can she do to prevent him from taking everything from her?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
